thread.title: ‘King’ Amitabh Bachchan and ‘Queen’ Kangana Ranaut in ad together
thread.title_full: ‘King’ Amitabh Bachchan and ‘Queen’ Kangana Ranaut in ad together | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: ‘King’ Amitabh Bachchan and ‘Queen’ Kangana Ranaut in ad together
text:
While Amitabh Bachchan is the undisputed king of Bollywood , Kangana Ranaut has, only recently, been crowned as the ‘Queen’. And what would be more natural than to bring them together, if not in a movie, then at least in an ad.
The legendary Amitabh Bachchan and the flavour of the season Kangana Ranaut have recently shot an ad together and the man responsible for bringing them together was the ‘Midas Touch’ director Rajkumar Hirani – the ad was shot on Friday.
A source from the set said that, “Kangana Ranaut has never sported a look like this before – absolutely stunning”.
The same source added, “Mr. Bachchan was highly impressed by Kangana’s conduct on the sets and said that she was extremely professional, soft spoken and very easy to work with.”
Speaking about his experience of working with Kangana Ranaut, Amitabh Bachchan said, “At work at last. With the wonder called Kangana Ranaut. She’s so good and talented and wonderful.”
First Published on August 01, 2015 7:22 pm
